movies.title: La sedia della felicità
movies.plot: During her visit to a prison to do the nails to an old lady and former head of a criminal clan, a broke beautician is the recipient of the last words of the dying lady whispering the hideout of a treasure, supposedly in an old chair in the lady's mansion. The beautician sets forth to find the treasure, but all the belongings of the mansion have been confiscated and auctioned. The beautician seeks help by the neighbor's's shop, a tattoo studio, where the broke owner does everything he can to help, and discovers that there are eight identical chairs and that there is a way to find their owners. The quest to find the lucky chair brings the couple around the Veneto region trying to persuade the chair owners that they don't really need them. A magician, a greedy priest, industrious immigrated entrepreneurs, a grumpy fishmonger and a shepherd in the alps are some of the characters the couple find in their pursuit of happiness.
movies.simplePlot: During her visit to a prison to do the nails to an old lady and former head of a criminal clan, a broke beautician is the recipient of the last words of the dying lady whispering the ...

biography.bio: Valerio Mastandrea was born on February 14, 1972 in Garbatella, Rome, Lazio, Italy. He is an actor and producer, known for La prima cosa bella (2010), Piazza Fontana (2012) and Long Live Freedom (2013).
biography.name: Valerio Mastandrea

biography.bio: Isabella Ragonese was born on May 19, 1981 in Palermo, Sicily, Italy. She is an actress, known for Tutta la vita davanti (2008), Dix hivers à Venise (2009) and La nostra vita (2010).
biography.name: Isabella Ragonese

biography.bio: Giuseppe Battiston was born on July 22, 1968 in Udine, Friuli-Venezia Giulia, Italy. He is an actor and writer, known for Perfect Strangers (2016), Pain, tulipes et comédie (2000) and Zoran, My Nephew the Idiot (2013).
biography.name: Giuseppe Battiston

biography.bio: Raul Cremona was born on November 10, 1956 in Milan, Lombardy, Italy. He is an actor, known for La sedia della felicità (2013), Cado dalle nubi (2009) and Italiano medio (2015).
biography.name: Raul Cremona

biography.bio: Maria Paiato is an actress, known for Amore (2009), The Passion (2010) and La sedia della felicità (2013).
biography.name: Maria Paiato

biography.bio: Lucia Mascino is an actress, known for Habemus Papam (2011), One Day in a Life (2008) and Long Live Freedom (2013).
biography.name: Lucia Mascino

biography.bio: Natalino Balasso was born on December 2, 1960 in Porto Tolle, Veneto, Italy. He is an actor and director, known for La sedia della felicità (2013), The Passion (2010) and Generazione mille euro (2009).
biography.name: Natalino Balasso

biography.bio: Roberto Abbiati was born on September 25, 1958 in Seregno, Italy. He is an actor, known for La sedia della felicità (2013), The Passion (2010) and The Right Distance (2007).
biography.name: Roberto Abbiati

biography.bio: Mirko Artuso is an actor, known for La sedia della felicità (2013), Little Teachers (1998) and Nel nome del male (2009).
biography.name: Mirko Artuso

biography.bio: Cosimo Messeri was born in Fiesole in 1985, but he has lived in Rome all his life. After being assistant director to Nanni Moretti and Carlo Mazzacurati, he went on to write, direct, and act in the short films Zeldman (2006), awarded the Best First Film and Critics' Prize at the Valdarno Cinema Fedic Festival; and Le Jour J (2008), as well as the self-produced feature Detesto L'elettronica Stop (2008), for which he won the Prize for Best Acting Debut at the Sarajevo Film Festival. He composes, plays, and sings in the band Plastic Macs.
biography.name: Cosimo Messeri

biography.bio: Pierantonio 'Noki' Novara is an actor, known for La sedia della felicità (2013), Up at the Villa (2000) and Tutto tutto niente niente (2012).
biography.name: Pierantonio 'Noki' Novara

biography.bio: Katia Ricciarelli was born on January 18, 1946 in Rovigo, Veneto, Italy as Catiuscia Mariastella Ricciarelli. She is an actress, known for Otello (1986), La seconda notte di nozze (2005) and Un ballo in maschera (1975). She was previously married to Pippo Baudo.
biography.name: Katia Ricciarelli

biography.bio: Roberto Citran was born on January 26, 1955 in Padua, Veneto, Italy. He is an actor, known for Hotel Rwanda (2004), La petite Venise (2011) and Il toro (1994).
biography.name: Roberto Citran

biography.bio: Marco Marzocca (born 14 September 1962) is an Italian actor and comedian. Born in Rome, Marzocca worked as a pharmacist until 1994, when he began working as a sidekick of the comedian Corrado Guzzanti in a series of stage and television shows. During the TV show "Il caso Scrafoglia" he created Ariel, a comic caricature of a bizarre Filipino domestic worker, a character he later reprised in a series of television variety shows including Rai 2's "Bulldozer" and Canale 5's "Zelig". He is also well known for the role of the policeman Ugo Lombardi in the crime TV-series "Distretto di Polizia", of which he was in the main cast for all the 11 seasons.
biography.name: Marco Marzocca

biography.bio: Milena Vukotic was born on April 23, 1935 in Rome, Lazio, Italy. She is known for her work on Letters to Juliet (2010), The Discreet Charm of the Bourgeoisie (1972) and That Obscure Object of Desire (1977).
biography.name: Milena Vukotic

categories.category: Best Supporting Actor (Migliore Attore non Protagonista)
Best Supporting Actress (Migliore Attrice non Protagonista)

awards.award: Italian National Syndicate of Film Journalists 2014

titlesAwards.titleAwardOutcome: Won Silver Ribbon of the Year
